/* eslint-disable no-octal-escape */ import React from "react"; import { SRLWrapper } from "simple-react-lightbox"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import ProductOne from "./ProductOne"; import Spacer from "../common/Spacer"; function Product() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>

{t("ÜRETİM")}

 ); } export default Product;
